#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll _modmul(ll a, ll b, ll mod) 
 {
   a%=mod;
    b%=mod;
  long double res = a;
  res *= b;
  ll c = ll(res / mod);
  a *= b;
  a -= c * mod;
  a %= mod;
  if (a < 0) a += mod;
  return a;
 }

int main()
{
 	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
 	int t;ll n,b,res;
 	cin>>t;
 	while(t--)
 	{
 		cin>>n;cin>>b;res=1;
 		for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) 
		{
        res = _modmul(res, i,2*b);
 	    }
 	    if(res >= 0 && res < b) cout<<"Even\n";
 	    else      cout<<"Odd\n";
 	}
	return 0;
}
